description:
Mom is extremely worried because Bunji is showing zero interest in reading. Surprised that he cannot do math at all either, she makes him do math tables. Bunji then...; Bunji scores a 90 on his kanji test! The Kamohara household is delighted. When Mom tries to teach him the one he got wrong, Dad interrupts with his special kanji training!; Fumi hides under her bed and won`t come out. Mom brushes it off, but Dad sees it as a sign of her soul and many hijinks ensue.; Dad and Fumi go to the supermarket on an errand run. While Dad is trying to get a read on Fumi`s soul`s sign, he manages to get inebriated at a wine tasting they`re holding. Only then does Fumi open up...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Reading Time / Kanji / Heart Signs / Errand
読書時間 / 漢字 / 忍法娘 / おつかい
